p:
For arbidol: A multicenter, prospective study
16 reported, compared with dual combination of lopinavir-ritonavir and interferon-α-2b, triple combination of arbidol can shorten the time of viral nucleic acid turning negative and hospitalization time ( P < 0.05). In addition, a retrospective study
17 showed no significant difference of the time of viral nucleic acid turning negative among arbidol treatment, lopinavir-ritonavir treatment and control group ( P > 0.05).
